TopicTitle: Module manager patch too remove Lifting surface part module.

Articles.Content: as the title says, i would like a module manager patch too remove the stock part module, lifting surface , from all parts, and it comes after all other module manager configs. i want it because i use FAR, and most of the things that use the obsolete (because of far) lifting surface part modules are fuselages that arent too impacted if they have it removed. i asked for this a long time ago, and someone posted something, but i cannot for the life of me find it. i searched for like, an hour in my posts trying too find where i requested this before, but alas, i couldnt find it.

I hope i understood what you want. 

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleLiftingSurface]]:Final
{    
-MODULE[ModuleLiftingSurface]
 {
 }
}
that looks like it works, looks similiar too what the original MM patch was. thanks, will try it!
